import React from "react"; const AdvancedCalculator = ({ onButtonClick }) => { const buttons = [ "7", "8", "9", "/", "√", "4", "5", "6", "*", "^2", "1", "2", "3", "-", "^3", "0", ".", "=", "+", "Backspace", "sin", "cos", "tan", "log", "ln", "π", "e", "(", ")", "x", "y", "z", ]; return (
{buttons.map((button) => ( ))}
); }; const styles = { calculatorContainer: { position: "fixed", bottom: "0", left: "0", right: "0", backgroundColor: "#f8f9fa", padding: "10px", borderTop: "1px solid #ccc", display: "flex", flexWrap: "wrap", justifyContent: "center", boxShadow: "0px -1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)", }, button: { width: "60px", height: "40px", margin: "5px", fontSize: "16px", backgroundColor: "#fff", border: "1px solid #ddd", borderRadius: "4px", cursor: "pointer", transition: "background-color 0.3s", }, }; export default AdvancedCalculator;
